transcript:
大家好，我是李璨。
Hi everyone, I’m Li Can. 大家好，我是李璨的老婆。
Hi everyone, I’m Li Can. 今天我们想聊一下：
Today we want to talk about: 就是中国南方人说普通话和北方人说普通话的区别。
The differences between the southern Mandarin and the northern Mandarin in China. 我就想起那天啊，我在和尧尧（我们儿子）玩的时候。
I remembered that day, when I was playing with Yao Yao (our son). 嗯。哈哈哈。这眼睛里闪烁着光芒。哈哈哈。
Ok. Hahaha. Your eyes are sparkling. Hahaha. 我就想起那天，感觉好像要出糗……
I remembered that day, I feel like I'm going to be embarrassed... 就想起那天我和尧尧说，聊天的时候啊，
I remembered that I said to Yaoyao that day when we were chatting, 我说：我的，我的脚有点不舒服。
I said: My, my foot is a little uncomfortable. 然后小家伙马上指出来说：
Then the little guy immediately pointed out: 爸爸，这个地方叫腿。
Dad, this is called leg. 哈哈哈……
Hahaha... 对，其实对我们南方人而言就是，
Yes, actually for us southerners, 这个往下的部位它全部都是脚。
The parts below this are all feet. 还有就是，哈哈哈，还有就是这个，我们都叫手。
And this, hahaha, and this, we all call hands. 我们没有胳膊这个词儿，哈哈哈。
We don't have the word "arm", hahaha. 就是……你们要是你们要是，比如说去医院，
That’s... If you, for example, go to the hospital, 然后你给医生说：我脚疼，
Then you tell the doctor: My foot hurts, 那你明明是膝盖疼。
Then you obviously have knee pain. 你跟医生说：我脚疼吗？
Then you tell the doctor: my foot hurts? 不是，“膝盖”是有的。
No, we have "knees". 那大腿，比如说大腿受伤了呢？
What about the thigh, for example, the thigh is injured? 你跟医生说：我脚疼吗？
Then you tell the doctor: my foot hurts? 对，医生，我脚疼，你看这里。
Yes, doctor, my foot hurts, look here. 哈哈哈。
Hahaha. 总会有办法的，
There will always be a way, 再说他要是个南方医生，他肯定能懂啊。
Besides, if he were a southern doctor, he would definitely understand. 再说……那你一个脚，这么长一截，
Besides...then you have a foot, so long, 你怎么能知道是哪里呢？
How can you know where it is? 医生有眼睛的。哈哈……
The doctor has eyes. Haha... 我感觉就是平常啊，
I feel that in the daily life,  嗯。你现在尧尧都已经加入这个行列，
Yeah. Yao Yao has joined the team now, 我有点受不了了。
I can't take it anymore. 以前就是你一个人嘲笑我，对不对？嗯。
I used to laughed at by you alone, right? Yeah. 你看，你看现在尧尧也加入这个行列了。嗯。
But, you see Yao Yao has joined the team now. Yeah. 这个其实就是我们南方人……
This is actually because our southerners... 从小到大就这么说的，
we said that since we were little, （我们）有很多固定的这种说法，
(We) have a lot of sayings like this, 不是说我到北方生活几年，就能改过来的。
It's not that because I've lived in the north for a few years, then I can change it. 所以我内心深处还是一个南方人。
So deep in my heart I am still a southerner. 你要尊重我。
You need to respect me. 哈哈。不能过度地嘲笑我。
Haha. Don't laugh at me excessively. 我没有过度地嘲笑你，
I didn't laugh at you excessively, 只是我觉得，有的时候听，
It’s just that I think, sometimes when I listened to, 你给他读书，我就在想你作为一个中文的老师，
You read to him, I just thought of you as a Chinese teacher, 嗯，发音成那个样子，
Well, with such a poor pronunciation, 是不是有点搞笑？
Isn't it funny? 嗯，没啥。
Well, it's nothing. 我其实我的，我做老师的宗旨啊就是说：
As a matter of fact, the tenet of me as a Chinese teacher is: 你想学北方普通话也可以，
You can either learn northern Mandarin, 南方普通话也可以，
You can also Southern Mandarin, 没有关系，
It doesn't matter, 最好就自己开心就好，对吧？
As long as you're happy, that's OK, right? 真的我那天看了有一个印度的博主啊，
Actually, I watch the videos of an Indian YouTuber the other day, 他的名字叫什么马怒，
His name is MANU or something, 还有个伊拉克的人啊，
There is also someone from Iraq, 他说普通话说得可好了，
They speak Mandarin perfectly, 说的南方的口音。哈哈哈。
With a southern accent. Hahaha. 说南方口音有一个好处，
There is an advantage to saying the southern accent, 不用发zhi chi shi，
You need need to pronounce zhi chi shi,, 还不用发后鼻音。
and velar nasal as well. 为什么我们南方人这几个音发不好呀？
Why can't we southerners pronounce these sounds quite well? 方便呀！你不用学……卷舌头多累啊！
Because it's convenient! You don’t need to learn... how tiresome it is to roll your tongue! 其实我看就有些外国朋友，
In fact, I think there are some foreign friends, 他们就是为什么有时候，说普通话的时候，
When they are speaking Mandarin, why do they, 感觉有点僵硬？
Sound so stiff? 就是把自己太局限，一定要说北方普通话，
It's because they've limited themselves to speak only northern Mandarin. 嗯。是吧？
Yeah. Right? 是的。其实没有关系，
Yes it is. Actually it doesn't matter, 中国有一半都是南方人嘛。
Half of Chinese are southerners. 嗯。对吧？嗯。
Yeah. Right? Yeah. 所以就：开心就好。
So: just be happy. 对不对？哎，我想起，
Right? Well, I remembered, 看那个综艺，
Watching that variety show, 里面那个脱口秀演员她不是北方人……东北人。
Isn't that talk show actress in it from the north... from the northeast? 她不是就有问那个主持人怎么样能把普通话说好？
Didn't she ask the host how to speak Mandarin well? 对对对。就是因为东北话，东北话，东北话的尾音，对对对。
Exactly. It's because of the Northeast dialect, the Northeast dialect, and the ending sound of the Northeast dialect. 然后她就想说得比较，
Then she wanted to speak more, 标准一些。标准一些。
More standard. More standard. 但是那东北话其实听起来就你说的特别的慵懒自如。
But that Northeastern dialect actually sounds like you said very lazy and comfortable. 对对对对。很轻松的感觉。
Exactly. It feels very relaxed. 对，就是北方人说话整体感觉，感觉不怎么用力。
Right, it feels like overall the northerners don't need much effort to speak. 特别越靠北越不用力。
Especially, the farther north, the less effort you need to put it in. 你像北京人说话可懒了。
Just like Beijinger, they are much lazy in speaking. 真的，儿化音多得不得了。
Really, there are so many Erhua in their speaking. 那你其实是不是挺羡慕的？
Are you actually quite envious? 我不羡慕，我为什么要羡慕？因为轻松啊，哈哈哈。
I don't envy, why should I envy? Because it's relaxed, hahaha. 是，其实我跟你说，有时候，
Yes, actually I tell you that sometimes, 为什么有时候感觉我说话累？
Why do I feel tired in speaking sometimes? 我有时候为了刻意地说点北方话而已。
Sometimes I deliberately try to speak northern mandarin. 我要是……但是我现在处在一个比较尴尬的境地。
If I were... but I'm in an awkward position now. 我到西安已经这么多年了，
I have been in Xi'an for so many years, 我的南方话呢，就是南方普通话有点被我忘了，
My southern dialect, namely southern mandarin, is a bit forgotten by me. 北方话又没有到那么好的程度，中不溜这种水平。
My northern Mandarin isn't that good yet, so I'm stuck in the middle. 所以有时候我要刻意想说好一些，
So sometimes I deliberately try to sound more like it, 又想轻松点嘛，都做不到，你知道吧？
I want to get relaxed , but I can't do it, you know? 就只能在这么种状态。
So I can only remain in this state. 我发现一个训练方法：就是读书。
I found a training method: reading. 我之前不读了好多那个《哈利波特》？
I haven read some chapters of "Harry Potter" before. 就读的时候，
When I was reading,  读着读，就翘舌音出来，我就读错，
When I was reading, retroflex appeared, then I would make a mistake, 我重复读，读了好多。
Then I read it repeatedly for several times. 就是但是发现越读到后面，我发现确实，
But I found that the more I read it, the more I found that indeed, 很多音我一看我就知道是怎么回事。
I would immediately recognize most sounds once I saw them. 嗯。还是有进步的。
I indeed made some progress. 还有一个方法就是：
Another method is: 我成天给尧尧读书啊，
I read pictures books to Yao Yao a lot, 你不能因为我读错一两个字你笑我，
You shouldn't laugh at me because I mispronounced a word or two, 其实我整体还可以了。
In fact, I speak quite well overall. 好很多了。好很多啊。
Much better. A lot better. 从第一本到最后，应该录一下，
From the first book to the last one, I should have recorded them, 做一个对比，你知道吧？
Make a comparison, you know? 现在已经好很多了真的。是。
It's much better now, really. Yes. 我记得咱们过年，回去的时候，
I remember when we went to your hometown during the Chinese New Year, 听到你朋友说浙普，我就觉得接受不了了已经，
When your friend said Zhejiang Mandarin, I felt that I couldn’t stand it anymore. 但是想想你原来也是那样。我原来这样。
But think of it, you were like that. I was like that. 我大学的时候，好可惜没留下这个，
It was such a pity I didn't leave anything in the university, 那个啥声音的（记录）。哈哈哈，对。
The (recording) of voices. Hahaha. Right. 我好像有背景音，好像出现过，对对对对，
I seemed to appear in some video background, yeah, yeah, yeah, 咱们毕业之前在那个图书馆前面，
We were in front of the library before we graduated, 我拍你的时候我说话了，
I talked when I was filming you, 我当时口音就比较重，
I had a heavy accent at the time, 在重庆那个地方，大家都有那么重的口音，
But in Chongqing, everyone had such a heavy accent, 在重庆的人……看不出来……听不出来。
People in Chongqing... couldn't see it... couldn't hear it. 他们那个什么l和n是不分的,
They do not distinguish between l and n, 牛奶，我要喝，我要喝牛奶，是吧？哈哈。
Milk, I want to drink, I want to drink milk, right? Haha. 我要喝牛奶，我要喝牛奶，喝牛奶，对吧？
I want to drink milk, I want to drink milk, drink milk, right? 所以根本看不出我这个，
So I couldn't see me... 说不来还挺能融入的，
Maybe I could blend in easily, 反倒你们这些北方融入不了，你知道吧？
On the contrary, you northers couldn't blend in easily, you know? 所以其实我觉得说什么话都无所谓，就，
So in fact, I think it doesn’t matter what you say, just, 关键，中国人说话，关键你要四声要说对，
The key, as Chinese speaks, the key is that you have to put the four tones right, 四声说不对，那肯定出大麻烦，
If you didn't put the four tones right, you will be big trouble, 四声一定要一定要说对。
You must say the four tones right. 其实都没有大问题。
In fact, there is no big problem. 我突然想起当年啊我们高考那年，
I suddenly remembered that year when we had the college entrance examination, 疯传就谣传说要在第一个，
There was a rumor going on that in the Question, 不是我们第一题不是那个拼音嘛，
Wasn't our First Question was on Pinyin? 要加入翘舌音和平舌音还有后鼻音，
The would be blade-alveolars, retroflexes and even velar nasal Pinyin test, 我们南方人疯啦！
We southerners were driven crazy by that! 这不是要我们命。哈哈。
This was killing us. Haha. 所以整体南方人都是说不来这些音的。
Therefore, the southerners as a whole cannot pronounce these sounds properly. 还有有些，你像福建那地方，还有湖南的，还有
There are some, just like people from Fujian, as well as Hunan, and m/f不分。
They can't distinguish m/f. 湖南，湖南对吧？湖南人。
Hunan, Hunan, right? Hunan person. m/f不分？
They can't distinguish m/f. 对啊。
Right. 这个m……哦，
This m...oh, f，h/f不分，哈哈哈。h/f不分，对啊，湖南对吧？
F, no distinction between h/f, hahaha. no distinction between h/f, right, Hunan, right? 其实好，之前我真的像你说的出来好几年了，
Actually, just like what you said, I've been out for several years, 有些都忘了。
I've already forgotten some. 确实回去一听狐狸（我朋友）他们说话的时候觉得很明显。
I did find it obvious listening to Fox (my friend) and others speak when I was back. 是的。我记得咱们第一回去，
Yes. I remember that when we went back the first time, 我记得你还嘲笑过狐狸，
I remembered that you laughed at Fox, 一句话里面错了三个字。
He pronounced three words wrong in one sentence. 一句话说了四个字，
He said four words in one sentence, 然后三个字的发音都不对。
Then the pronunciation of the three words was wrong. 对对，真的口音还挺明显的啊。
Yes, his accent was quite obvious. 对吧？但是口音这东西，
Right? But the accent, 其实真的我觉得还挺好玩的。
Actually, I think it's quite interesting. 有时候看那些博主啊啥的，
Sometimes I watched the videos of some bloggers, 反倒是他们特色，比较亲切嘛，对吧？
I found it their characteristics, which made them much cordial, right? 你要都是字正腔圆的话，
If you always speak with clear articulation, 反倒也不好。
That's not good. 我看有些人就是说普通话，
I see that some people when they speak Mandarin,  就说得太字正腔圆，
They just speak it with too clear articulation, 有点距离感。对。
It will make you appear too lofty. Right. 为什么现在好多人，就有很多明星，
Why are there so many people now, so many stars, 他们其实在演电视电影的时候会比较正常，
They are actually quite normal when they are acting in TV and movies, 为了推广吧，必须用普通话。
In order to promote it, Mandarin must be used. 但是私底下说的方言，带一点点方言，
But they speak dialect in private, or with a hint of dialect, 你像那个雷佳音，
Just like Lei Jiayin, 在《极限挑战》里面说都是东北话，
He speaks Northeast dialect when featuring in the Reality Show Go Fighting! 干哈玩意。干哈玩意，我最喜欢干哈。哈哈哈。
What are you doing. What are you doing. I like this expression the best. Hahaha. 还有你像那个何炅，人家主持人啊，
And take He Jiong as another example, he is a TV host, 但那个里面，
But in that Reality Show, 《向往的生活》里动不动飙几个湖南话出来，特别好玩。
But he will frequently speak Hunan dialect in Back to Field, which is very interesting. 是吧？这方言其实挺好，挺有意思的，
Right? Dialect is actually quite good and interesting. 很好听的，方言很好听。
It sounds nice, and the dialect sounds nice. 咱们现在回归正题目啊，说了一大溜。
Let's return to the subject now, we've been meandering so far. 就是怎么说啊，
How to put it? 北方人说普通话和南方人说普通话，
When Northerners speak Mandarin and Southerners speak Mandarin, 有一个点，是区别很大，
There is a big difference, 就北方人说这个儿化音比较多。
The northerners have more Erhua in speaking. 嗯。对吧？嗯。
Yeah. Right? Yeah. 除了像北京人那种特别变态的，然后说，
Except for Beijinger who speak with abnormally plentiful Erhua, then, 北京人确实儿化音太多了。
Beijingers really have too many Erhua. 对。什么感觉都能（说成）儿化音。
Almost any word can into Erhua. 就是之前好像有些视频就说：
Just like some videos before: 南方人被儿化音逼疯的例子可多。
Showing many southerners driven crazy by Erhua. 真不知道儿化音该加在哪块？
They really don't where to put Erhua. 大家很多学普通话的那些朋友可能也会，
Many of you who learn Mandarin may also be, 好奇这个儿化音应该，“儿”应……
Curious about where this Erhuan should be, where"er" should be... 这个“儿”应该放在哪块比较合适？
Where should this "er" be placed? 其实我作为过来人，
Actually, as someone who had the same experience before, 我以前是没有儿化音的，
I didn't speak with Erhua before, 我就觉得其实这个儿化音真的用到的场合比较少。
I think that in fact, this Erhua is actually used in relatively few occasions. 嗯。不多。
Ok. Not much. 就翻来覆去就那么几个地方。嗯。
It is only used in a few places repeatedly. Yeah. 你要想用你就用，
If you want to use it, use it, 你要不想用无所谓。
It doesn't matter if you don't want to use it. 但我就稍微总结了几个比较常用的，
But I've just summarized a few of the most commonly used ones, 咱们来对比一下。
Let's compare them. 好吧？比如说像：这里。
Ok? For example, like: here. 北方人应该怎么说？这儿。就这儿，对不对？
What should the northerners say? Here. Right here, right? 哎，我那天发现其实你儿化音并不是很多。
Well, I found out that you didn't speak with many Erhua before. 我的儿化音不多吗？
I didn't speak with many Erhua? 儿化音音不多，还没有我多呢。
Not that many, not as many as me. 我有一个外来人口比你儿化音还多。
I as a outsider use more Erhua then you do. 还有那里。那儿。那儿。
There is still there. there. there. 还有哪里。哪儿。哪儿。
And Where. where. where. 对都是这种状态。
Well, just like that. 还有一句话就是：你没事吧？
There is another sentence: Are you okay? 你没事儿吧？
Are you okay? 对。我感觉这个你没事儿吧，
I felt that in this "are you okay?", 就感觉你这个语气出来了。
You've attached a particular tone to it. 你没事儿吧？哈哈。
Are you okay? Haha. 但是你没事吧？就感觉很关心啊。
But are you okay? It feels more like caring for someone. 你没事儿吧？就是你肯定有事儿。
Are you okay? There must be something wrong with you. 是吧？那你看你怎么演绎了。
Right? It depends on how you interpret it. 那你用这个北方人就很关心的，
Then you try to care for someone in a northerner way, 嗯。没事吧？
Ok. Are you okay? 然后鄙视：没事儿吧你？哈哈哈。
Then you despise him: Are you okay? Hahaha. 是这个状态。
Just like this. 还有咱们比较常用的就是：开门。
And we also have some commonly-used one: open the door. 开门儿。开门儿，是吧？
Open the door. Open the door, right? 我发现你这个儿化音不是特别重，
I found that your Erhua was not very heavy, 所以其实很多人可以像你学习，
So in fact, many people can learn from you, 就是稍微带过就行。嗯。对吧？
You just speak it very lightly. Yeah. Right? 稍微轻轻地带过。开门儿。开门儿。门儿。对吧？
Speak it very lightly. Open the door. Open the door. Door. Right? 不要说很明显就开门儿， 这没有必要。
Don’t say quite obviously, just open the door, it’s not necessary. 很明显感觉就反倒有点做作不自然了。
If it's too obvious, it feels a bit artificial and unnatural. 我在想陕西话里好像这几个词都没有儿化音。
I'm thinking that these words in Shaanxi dialect seem to have no Erhua. 陕西话方言里面是没有的，对啊，陕西话里：
There is no Erhua in Shaanxi dialect, yes, in Shaanxi dialect: 哪里。阿达。哈哈哈
Where. Ada. Hahaha 阿达。
Ada. 然后比如说门就是门。就是门哈。嗯。
Then, for example, the door is the door. It's the door. Yeah. 那你们为什么会说儿化音呢？
Then why can you say Erhua? 天赋吧。
Maybe talent. 就是……
That is... 让我再想想陕西话里有吗？
Let me think again. Is there any in Shaanxi dialect? 有。凉皮儿。凉皮儿。对对对，凉皮儿。
Have. Cold noodle. Cold noodle. Yes, yes, Cold noodle.  就是好像“皮”这个音好像都有个儿化音……凉皮儿。
It just seems that the sound "pi" seems to have Erhua... Cold noodle. 你的皮儿太硬了，脸皮儿，没有这种说法吧？
Your skin is too hard, your cheeks, don’t you say that? 脸皮嘛。但我们陕西话脸皮就是脸皮，
Cheeks. But in Shaanxi Dialect cheeks are only cheeks. 脸皮。脸皮。那普通话嘞？
Cheeks. Cheeks. How about Mandarin? 脸皮。但没有“儿”哈？
Cheeks. But there is no Er? 那你就很奇怪为什么凉皮儿有这个音，
Then it's so curious that why Cold Noodle has this sound, 脸皮又没有这个音呢？
Yet cheeks don't have the sound? 不知道。对哈，就是好像，
Do not know. Yeah, it's like, 莫名其妙的，就没有规律可循，
Inexplicable, there is no rule to follow, 然后对，还有个吃的叫凉鱼嘛，
And yes, there is another one called Liangyu, 凉鱼。陕西话是凉鱼儿。
Liangyu. Shaanxi dialect is Liangyuer. 啊，陕西话凉，就小，这个小鱼的鱼啊？对。凉鱼。
Ah, the Shaanxi dialect cool, so it’s just the fish of small fish? Correct. Liangyu. 鱼鱼儿。啊，那你发一个小鱼儿，这个连起来说一下。小鱼儿。
Yuyuer. Ah, then you pronounce Xiaoyuer, pronounce them together. Xiaoyuer. 小鱼儿，哈哈哈。
Xiaoyuer. Hahaha. 不是有个那个电影叫《绝代双娇》，
Isn't there a movie called Handsome Siblings , 那个叫什么？小鱼儿。
What's the name of one lead character? Xiaoyuer. 那个连起来是什么？小鱼儿。小鱼儿。
How about pronounce the together? Xiaoyuer. Xiaoyuer. 但是你看原来院子里有个小孩的名字不叫小鱼儿吗？
Wasn't there a little boy called Xiaoyuer in our residential community? 啊，叫小鱼儿。那我们都会叫他小鱼儿。NAh, he was called Xiaoyuer. Then we would call him Xiaoyuer. 不会叫他小鱼儿。
We wouldn't call him Xiaoyuer. 就是就不会故意这样叫……你像雪儿，
We wouldn’t call him that way on purpose...just like Xueer. 雪儿不就叫雪儿嘛。也不叫雪儿，雪儿。 哈哈哈。
Isn't Xueer just Xueer? Nobody would say Xueer, Xueer. Hahaha. 这所以这个就是没有完全没有规律，
So this is completely irregular, 我发现，就随机，就是
I found that it was random, that is 可能你听多了差不多就能……就那么几个我发现。
Maybe after you hear a lot you almost can.. I found out there were only a few. 比如说一般好像是，嗯，有个动词，
For example, it generally seems to be, um, there is a verb, 我发现了，我就找了找啊，
I found it, so I looked for more, 只有一个动词好像是儿化音的。
There is only one verb that seems to have Erhua. 就是我喜欢玩的那个“玩”，
It's just the "play" in I like to play, 玩儿。玩儿，对别的好像动词都没有。
Play. Play. Other verbs don't seem to have Erhua. 没有任何动词，很奇怪，为什么玩儿是这样。
No other verbs, it's so strange, why "play" is like this? 别的都没有，特别奇怪。
Why no other verb is like that, so strange. 还有个比较常用一些量词吧，就，
There are some more commonly used quantifiers, just, 点儿，点儿，对，一点儿。块儿。块儿，对。片儿。片儿。
A little bit, a little bit, yes, a little bit. Piece. Piece. yes. Piece. Piece. 还有没，半儿。一半儿。一半儿。。
Anything else, half. Half. Half. 还有一就是一个好像专门只有儿化音里面有的就是，
There is another one that seems to only exist in Erhua, which is, 就是我们南方人不这样说，
We southerners don’t say that, 就是一会儿。就是。一会儿。
For a while. That's it. For a while. 一会儿。对，我们要比如说：你等我一会儿。
For a while. Yes, for example we say: you wait for me for a while. 我先这样说大家好理解。
I said it that way so that everyone can understands it well. 等我一会儿。我们南方人一般会说：等我一下。
Wait for me a while. We southerners usually say: wait for me a bit. 你们说等我会儿。等，怎么说？
You said wait for me. Wait, how do you say? 等我会儿。等我一会儿。等我会儿。等会儿，对吧？
Wait for me. wait for me a bit. Wait for me. Wait a minute, right? 就是这几个其实我感觉真的不多啊。
I really feel there aren't that many after all. 好像，我们把这几个再总结一下差不多，
Just like, what we've summarized are almost all of them, 大家能把这个几个记住了，
If everyone can remember these few, 基本儿化音你就可以蒙混过关了。
You basically can get by with Erhua. 还有就是，有一个就是，
There is, there is one, 一到夏天呢，大家都特别喜欢吃这个东西，
In summer, everyone likes to eat this food. 撸串儿。撸串儿。
Eating kebabs. Eating kebabs.  就串儿，对吧？嗯。
It's just kebabs, right? Yeah. 北方人叫串儿。南方人叫烧烤。
Northerners call it kebabs. Southerners call it BBQ. 北方好像也叫烧烤。
It's also called BBQ in the North. 但是一般情况说出去吃就会说：
But generally speaking, if you go out to eat, you will say: 咱们撸个串儿。
Let's go to eat kebabs. 嗯。这串儿这个音挺有特色的，大家可以记住。
Yeah. This sound of kebabs is quite special. You should try to remember it. 还有其实除了这个儿化音啊，我们还有就是，
In fact, in addition to the Erhua, we still have, 南方普通话和北方普通话就是有些叫法会不一样。
Things are called differently in Southern Mandarin and Northern Mandarin. 就我记得当年我才来西安的时候，
As far as I remember when I came to Xi’an, 你成天要纠正我，
You would try to correct me very often, 我特别受不了，但是……菜花。对，菜花和花菜。
I couldn't stand it, but...cauliflower. Yes, cauliflower and cauliflower. 菜花和花菜，
Cauliflower and cauliflower, 就你想一下我们叫菜花，
Just think about it, you call it cauliflower, 对吧？我们叫菜花。你们叫菜花……
Right? We call it cauliflower. You call it cauliflower... 我们叫花菜。
We call it cauliflower. 对，我觉得对啊，像花一样的菜嘛。
Yes, I think it's right, it's a flower-like vegetable. 又不是像菜一样的花。
It's not a vegetable like flower. 对不对？这个菜像花一样啊。
Right? This vegetable is like a flower. 那你们不是……这个菜像花一样？
Then aren't you...the vegetable is like a flower? 那菜花，那不对啊，那不就像肉夹馍，
That cauliflower, that’s not right, isn't it like Roujiamo, 肉夹于馍这样理解？对，是的。
just like the meat is sandwiched by the pita? Yeah, that's right. 还有比如说你看啊，
And for example, as you can see, 还有就是有一个，
There is another one, 到现在你还要纠正我，就让我受不了，
Until now you still will correct me, which is quite unbearable. 比如说咱们外面墙上挂那个东西，
For example, that thing we hang on the wall outside, 我成天和尧尧说的时候，
Whenever I mentioned it to Yao Yao,  你要说，你就要说我，
You would say, and you would correct me, 墙上挂的什么？那是钟啊。
What is hanging on the wall? That's a clock. 不是表吗？
Isn't that a watch? 就南方人都叫钟啊。哈哈哈。
We southerners all call it a clock. Hahaha. 不是，你不叫它钟，你叫它闹钟，
No, you didn't call it a clock, you called it an alarm clock, 哈哈……你倒是闹给我听听啊。
Haha... where is the alarm in it? 我和你说这些， 这些钟它有些是可以上闹（钟）的， 哈哈哈。
I tell you, some of the clocks really can set alarm, hahaha. 它有这么按键嘛。可是它没有啊。
It has some sorts of buttons. But it doesn't have. 它就是一个表啊。
It is a watch. 我们都管它叫钟嘛，
We all call it a clock, 但是闹钟两个字连起来比较顺，对吧？
But the two words "Alarm Clock" sound better, right? 我们那个钟指的一般是比较大的那种，
Our clock refers to the larger one, 对，中国人比较忌讳那个送钟（送终谐音）的钟。大家好，我是李璨。
Yes, the Chinese are more taboo about giving clock as gift (attending people's funeral ). 就比较落地的那种钟啊。
Just those clocks that are standing on the floor. 我们反正都叫钟。
We call them clocks anyway. 表我们是那种挂着，就是戴手上那种表。
Watch is the kind we hang, no, we wear on our hand. 谁把表挂墙上，哈哈。
Who would hang a watch on the wall. Hahaha. 还有还有这个东西你叫什么，你们？
And what's your name for this thing? 土豆啊。你们也叫土豆。洋芋啊，
Potatoes. You are also call it potatoes. Potatoes, 哎，你们也叫洋芋。对啊。也叫土豆。
Well, you also call it potatoes. Right. Also call it potatoes. 陕西话叫洋芋。啊~
It's also called potatoes in Shaanxi dialect. Ah~ 普通话叫土豆。啊~
It's also called potatoes in Mandarin. Ah~ 还有一种叫马铃薯。啊~
There is also another saying to it. Ah~ 好吧，哈哈哈。
All right, hahaha. 我以为你们叫的不一样，啊，对对对，
I thought you call it differently, ah, exactly, 陕北那边好像什么洋芋叉叉。对啊，
There seems to have Potato Chacha in northern Shaanxi. Right. 洋芋嘛。啊~
Potatoes. Ah~ 我以为我们南方的叫洋芋呢。
I thought only southerners call it potatoes. 我们龙泉话叫央五，所以，哈哈哈哈。
We call it Yangwu in Longquan dialect, so, hahaha. 因为这个东西为什么加个“洋”呢？
Why this thing has a word "foreign"? 因为它是国外传进来的。
Because it was imported from abroad. 最早中国是没有土豆这玩意儿，
There was no such thing as potatoes in China at the beginning. 那你们西红柿怎么叫？
Then what do you call tomatoes? 番，番茄呀。
Tomato. 再早呢，怎么叫？再土一点的？
How about times early, how was it called? In a more native way? 我们就叫番茄。
We just call it Tomato. 我们叫洋柿子。
We called it Foreign Persimmon. 洋柿子是什么玩意？洋嘛。我知道。
What is a foreign persimmon? Foreign. I know. 你跟洋芋的洋一样。我们叫洋柿子。
It's the same as the foreign in Potatoes. We call it foreign persimmon. 跟洋芋洋柿子……
Just like potato and foreign persimmon... 它和柿子还真有点像。
It is really like persimmon. 洋柿子啊。
Foreign persimmon. 但是一个……啊，它以前古代是不是当水果来吃的？
But one...ah, was it eaten as a fruit in ancient times? 嗯。柿子一样。洋柿子。
Yeah. The same as persimmons. Foreign persimmon. 但是这个番茄的“番”也是国外的意思。
But the "fan" of this tomato also means abroad. 那我问你，火柴你们怎么叫？火柴我们叫……
Then I ask you, what do you call matches? We call matches... 火柴，哈哈哈。
Matches, hahaha. 我们叫洋火。
We called it foreign fire. 洋火呀？啊。洋火，对也是国外传进来的。
Foreign fire? what. Foreign fire, yes, also came from abroad. 是吗？对，最早反正叫洋火，
is it? Yes, it was originally called Foreign Fire anyway, 我知道，在上海滩那儿好像就叫洋火。
I know that it seems to be called Foreign Fire in Shanghai 1930s. 我们反正叫火柴。
We call it matches anyway. 我龙泉话怎么叫我忘了，哈哈哈哈。
How to say it in Longquan dialect, I've forgotten, hahahaha. 还有这东西比较常见。
And this thing is quite common. 玉米啊。玉米。苞谷。苞……
Corn. Corn. Corn. Co... 我发现可能现在就是南北大融合，
I found that it may be the integration of North and South, 大家很多东西都差不多哈。
Many things are almost the same to everyone. 不会啊，我从小都这样叫啊。
No, I've always called it this way since I was a kid. 你叫什么？叫苞谷。叫苞谷，对对对。
How do you call it? It's called Baogu. It's called Baogu, exactly. 你们叫苞谷。
You call it Baogu. 我们叫苞谷啊。我们叫玉米。
You call it Baogu. We call it corn. 嗯，对，但是我们老家话是叫苞罗嘛。
Yeah, right, but it's called Baoluo in my hometown dialect. 对，薄鲁，哈哈哈，薄鲁。
Yes, Baolu, hahaha, Baolu. 对下面这个东西，就是咱们又是一个争论点啊。
We have hot argument over the next thing. 哦。啊，这个东，这个东西。
Oh. Ah, this thing, thing. 你们，我们一直啊，
You, we always, 我们叫它：
We always call it: 小白菜，哈哈哈。
Bok choy, hahaha. 它是有点白嘛。
It is a bit white. 它哪里白了？它的茎是白的。
Which part of it is white? Its stem is white. 下面一个……你都是浅绿色，怎么能是白呢？
The next one...it's all light green, how can it be white? 不以颜色论英雄。
Don't judge a thing by its color. 那你可能……那为什么叫小白菜呢？
Then you might... Then why is it called bok choy? 为什么不叫它小菜？
Why you don't call it little vegetable? 既然不以颜色论，为什么不叫它小菜？
Since you don't judge it with color, why don't call it little vegetable? 反正我们就是这样传下来，
It was passed down to us anyway, 祖宗是没有错的，你知道吗？
The ancestors couldn't be wrong, you know? 老祖先就是这样说的。
This is what the ancestors said. 南方人管它叫小白菜，
Southerners call it bok choy, 我们把它叫小青菜。对，嗯！
We call it bok choy. Right, yeah! 就叫小白菜，咋？！。
We will call it bok choy, so what?! 还有呢就是下面这个，
There is another one below, 这个东西啊你们叫什么？
What's your name for this thing? 粥啊。粥哈？稀饭。
Congee. Congee? porridge. 哎呀，我这总结了几个好像都叫的差不多。
Oops, I summed up a few of them and they all seem to be called the same. 但好像我们我们，我以为……我们不叫粥。
But like us, I thought...we don’t call it porridge. 你们叫稀饭吧？
You call it porridge, right? 稀饭或米汤。米汤……
Porridge or rice soup. Rice soup... 那我感觉好像就是稀饭和……
Then I feel like porridge and... 稀饭和这个粥啊还是有区别的。
There is still a difference between porridge and congee. 粥应该更稠一些。
The congee should be thicker. 稀饭不是更稀，所以叫稀饭。嗯。
Isn't porridge thinner, so it is called porridge. Yeah. 你们陕西人吃这个稀饭比较稀。
The porridge you people from Shaanxi eat is quite thin. 不是啊。也有人喜欢喝稠的稀饭。
No. Some people like to drink thick porridge. 稠的那也叫稀饭。
Can the thick one be also called porridge? 它……只不过是稠的……它要不要脸，哈哈哈。
It... just thick... it should be shameless, hahaha. 你想喝稀一点的，还是稠一点的？对。
Do you want to drink thinner or thicker? Right. 对，我记得，有一次。
Yes, I remember, once, 不知道听谁，有个陕南的一个男的，
I don’t know who said that, that man was from southern Shaanxi, 我不知道什么因缘际会下被我认识了。嗯。
I don't know under what situations we made acquaintance. Yeah. 他和我吐槽呢。他可能是，他是陕南人，
He was complaining to me. Maybe he was from southern Shaanxi, 然后在这边生活，
And he lived here, 他呢说，他说，西安这边人喝稀饭太稀了，
He said that people the porridge drunk in Xi'an was too thin, 他说他们老家喝的稀饭特别稠，
He said the porridge they drunk in their hometown was very thick, 一个筷子立在上面都不会倒的那种。
Even a chopstick can stand in the porridge without the risk of falling over. 所以这个就是，
So this is, 就是整体北方可能叫稀饭的比较多。
People from the north as a whole tend to call it porridge, 粥你像还有广东那边人特别喜欢煲粥啊什么的，
As for congee, people in Guangdong like to cook porridge. 里面东西，放的东西特别多。
There are a lot of things inside. 什么海鲜呀，还有各种东西。
Some seafood, and all kinds of things. 但这边咱们喜欢喝，
But here we like to drink, 你们这边好像喜欢喝五谷粥。
You seem to like to drink five-grain porridge. 我不喜欢喝。
I don't like to drink. 嗯，对，你妈喜欢做。
Well, yes, your mother likes to cook it. 嗯，你不自己不是，你不喜欢喝啊？嗯。
Well, you’re not , you don't like to drink it? Yeah. 我喜欢喝白粥，
I like to drink white congee, 白粥有股清甜的感觉。
It has a sweetness to it. 再加点咸菜什么的，挺好的。
You can eat it with some pickles or something, it's quite good. 还有就是南方人和北方人这个对“饭”，
There is a disagreement of southerners and northerners over "fan", 这个字的界定就是不一样。
We have different definitions to it. 这也是我当时到这个西安来的一个困扰之一啊。
This was also one of the confusions to me when I first came to Xi'an. 就当时我同事问我：中午吃什么？
At that time, my colleague asked me: What do you want to eat for lunch? 我说：吃饭，哈哈。
I said: rice, haha. 他说：吃什么？
He said: eat what? 我说我说的不是很清楚了吗？吃饭。
I said didn't I say it quite clear? I said rice. 有什么好怀疑的。
What's to doubt about? 但因为对你们北方人而言，
But because for you northerners, 这个饭是比较广义的，对不对？对对。
This "fan" has more general meaning, right? Yeah. 午餐晚餐所有吃东西都叫饭。都叫饭。
Everything from lunch to dinner can be called fan. All can be called fan. 我们饭就是米饭的意思。
We only mean rice. 所以到现在我就是，
So now when I'm, 已经习惯了就说吃饭就要吃米饭。
used to say rice when I want to eat rice. 我回去的时候我爸，和我爸妈说吃米饭，
When I was back, I said to my parents, I wanted to eat rice, 我爸妈就……
My parents were like... 哈哈哈。还有一个就是，
Hahaha. There is another one, which is, 我不成天叫你媳妇吗？嗯。
Don't I just call you Xifu a lot? Yeah. 媳妇这一个是典型的北方人说法。嗯。
It's a typical northern expression. Yeah. 在南方人的理解里媳妇其实是儿媳妇。
In the eyes of southerners, Xifu actually is the wife of your son. 所以叫你媳妇其实你是尧尧的老婆，哈哈哈。
So calling you xifu actually means you're Yao Yao's wife, hahaha. 其实现在看来就是南方人
Actually, it seems that the differences  普通话和北方普通话差别没有那么大。
between the southern Mandarin and northern Mandarin are that big. 其实因为推广普通话推广得比较好，
Because Mandarin is actually promoted and popularized quite well, 相互理解比较容易，对吧？嗯。
So it’s easier to understand each other, right? Yeah. 大家，要是大家都说方言的话呢？
What if everyone speaks in local dialects? 我就觉得就麻烦了，对吧？
I think it would be troublesome, right? 那么今天咱们就到这吧，
So let's stop here today, 谢谢我老婆再次光临！哟！
Thank my wife for coming again! Yo! 这么高傲！哈哈哈，再见！
So proud! Hahaha, goodbye!

words.word: 大家好，我是李璨的老婆。
就是中国南方人说普通话和北方人说普通话的区别。
我就想起那天啊，我在和尧尧（我们儿子）玩的时候。
嗯。哈哈哈。这眼睛里闪烁着光芒。哈哈哈。
我就想起那天，感觉好像要出糗……
就想起那天我和尧尧说，聊天的时候啊，
我说：我的，我的脚有点不舒服。
然后小家伙马上指出来说：
对，其实对我们南方人而言就是，
这个往下的部位它全部都是脚。
还有就是，哈哈哈，还有就是这个，我们都叫手。
我们没有胳膊这个词儿，哈哈哈。
就是……你们要是你们要是，比如说去医院，
然后你给医生说：我脚疼，
那大腿，比如说大腿受伤了呢？
对，医生，我脚疼，你看这里。
再说他要是个南方医生，他肯定能懂啊。
再说……那你一个脚，这么长一截，
你怎么能知道是哪里呢？
嗯。你现在尧尧都已经加入这个行列，
以前就是你一个人嘲笑我，对不对？嗯。
你看，你看现在尧尧也加入这个行列了。嗯。
这个其实就是我们南方人……
（我们）有很多固定的这种说法，
不是说我到北方生活几年，就能改过来的。
所以我内心深处还是一个南方人。
哈哈。不能过度地嘲笑我。
只是我觉得，有的时候听，
你给他读书，我就在想你作为一个中文的老师，
我其实我的，我做老师的宗旨啊就是说：
你想学北方普通话也可以，
最好就自己开心就好，对吧？
真的我那天看了有一个印度的博主啊，
他说普通话说得可好了，
说的南方的口音。哈哈哈。
说南方口音有一个好处，
为什么我们南方人这几个音发不好呀？
方便呀！你不用学……卷舌头多累啊！
其实我看就有些外国朋友，
他们就是为什么有时候，说普通话的时候，
就是把自己太局限，一定要说北方普通话，
中国有一半都是南方人嘛。
里面那个脱口秀演员她不是北方人……东北人。
她不是就有问那个主持人怎么样能把普通话说好？
对对对。就是因为东北话，东北话，东北话的尾音，对对对。
但是那东北话其实听起来就你说的特别的慵懒自如。
对对对对。很轻松的感觉。
对，就是北方人说话整体感觉，感觉不怎么用力。
你像北京人说话可懒了。
